snippet: The United States national team will rely on forward Jozy Altidore at the World Cup, and he may have a newfound confidence after scoring twice against Nigeria on Saturday.
abstract: United States men's soccer team will rely on forward Jozy Altidore at the 2014 World Cup, and he may have a newfound confidence after scoring twice against Nigeria in warm-up friendly; Altidore had been in a scoring drought with the national team and with his Premier League club Sunderland.
lead_paragraph: The United States national team will rely on forward Jozy Altidore at the World Cup, and he may have a newfound confidence after scoring twice against Nigeria on Saturday.

headline.main: End of Altidore’s Slump Lifts U.S. Hopes
headline.print_headline: End of Altidore’s Slump Lifts U.S. Hopes

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
